amendment.description: To increase Federal assistance to food banks.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4252 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4252 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Brown. (consideration: CR 3/14/2008 S2078-2080; text: CR 3/14/2008 S2078) To increase Federal assistance to food banks.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4252 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
